name: Documentia
description:
Imagine a world living inside your computer files… So fragile and pure that any contact from the outside could wreck it beyond recognition… A game where you play inside your documents folder.

Discover what’s happening to the world of Documentia and try to preserve it. Or destroy it entirely…

But remember : everything that you do, everything that you delete will have an impact. 

The game features 5 endings and can vary wildly with every run. Feel free to tell us what ending you got in the comments and if you got the true ending but please keep the spoilers to a minimum.

Trigger warnings : death, grief and guilt.

Created by :

Lucas de Pinho : Art, Story

https://www.artstation.com/lucas_depinho
